li.a: LMS Voices in the Middle (Google Login Required)

div.div: We are pushing back the release of Marking Period 3 Report Cards until 4:00 PM on Wednesday, April 22. Genesis, our student information system, has had connectivity issues since last evening, so we want to make sure the platform is stable prior to going live with report cards.

div.p: All district communications regarding COVID-19 will be found at this location. This page will be our “hub.”

p.a: Food Service Program Letter – Revised on 04/16/20

p.br: Email [email protected] A member of the technology department will contact you via email. If you receive a phone call from a blocked number it might be IT as well.

em.strong: Attendance issues – please contact the school nurse via phone or email.

div.p: The NJ Department of Health has setup a hotline to answer questions from the public about COVID-19. It is open 24/7 and available in multiple languages. Call 1-800-222-1222.
Lumberton Township School District will continue to follow guidance provided by state and federal agencies as well as the New Jersey Department of Education as new updates are issued.

div.hr:
The mission of the Lumberton School District is to provide an educational program which promotes adaptability, safety awareness, respect for cultural differences, and the learning skills needed to meet the challenges of the 21st century.
